mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community(commnuityno, title, contents, rdate, files, filesaved, thumb, filesize, map, youtube, mp4, memberno, communitycateno) VALUES(community_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{contents}, sysdate, #{files}, #{filesaved}, #{thumb}, #{filesize}, #{map}, #{youtube}, #{mp4}, #{memberno}, #{communitycateno})
mapper.select: SELECT title, rdate, memberno, communitycateno FROM commnuity ORDER BY rdate ASC
SELECT title, rdate, memberno, communitycateno FROM commnuity WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR contents LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' ORDER BY rdate ASC
